translation.en: Yeah, there's been a bad car accident.
We're about two miles off the freeway.
She's got a punctured lung. Get her into Operating Room B.
Appears to be in her late 20s, car accident.
I'll love you forever and a day.
She's going into v-tach. She's unstable.
Tell B to have a crash cart ready.
How much longer are we waiting? Coming through.
Excuse me. I'm looking for my wife.
I'm Russell Williams. I got a call.
My wife Jennifer was in a car accident.
She's in the OR, sir. I'm sorry.
No, you can't go in there! Mr. Williams!
Nice work, everyone. Let's prep for surgery.
I'm sorry, you can't be here.
I was wondering if there's an update.
Okay, did she say anything to anyone about what happened?
translation.ko: 어떻게 사고가 난 건지 아내가 말했나요?

translation.en: has had a lot of internal bleeding on her brain...
It's possible she won't remember anything.
translation.ko: 아무것도 기억 못 할 확률이 커요

translation.en: If anything changes, I'll let you know.
your wife's out of surgery. She hasn't regained consciousness yet,
but if you want, I'll take you up to Recovery to see her.
I want you to know that I'm here
and I'm not gonna leave, no matter what. Okay?
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있어도 당신 안 떠나, 알겠지?

translation.en: They grow up so fast, don't they?
-You gotta enjoy it while it lasts. -Mm.
Oh, excuse me for a second.
I can be there in - what? - 45.
I'll take the bear as well.
Look, he's getting a big bear.
So they said they found Jennifer at a rest stop?
When was the last time you saw her?
That night, she went out to get groceries, said she wanted to cook dinner.
translation.ko: 그날 밤에요, 저녁 하겠다고 장 봐온다고 나갔거든요

translation.en: No, I waited about an hour, and...
I tried to call her cell phone. She didn't answer,
translation.ko: 아내 휴대폰으로 전화했는데 물론 안 받아서

translation.en: and then I called the store,
they said they hadn't seen her.
Have you been having problems at home, you and Jennifer?
translation.ko: 가정에 문제가 있었나요? 두 분 사이에요

translation.en: I'm trying to piece together what your wife was doing
translation.ko: 아내분이 뭘 하고 있었는지 이해하려는 거예요

translation.en: at a rest area with no ID.
Alone, in the middle of the night.
And I'd love to know the same thing.
But we had just gotten married,
we had just moved to the mountains.
When your wife went to the store, did she take her car?
translation.ko: 아내분이 가게에 갈 때 차를 갖고 갔나요?

translation.en: I'll start with a report on the car and see what happens.
translation.ko: 차량 분실 신고부터 하고 상황을 지켜보겠습니다

translation.en: I would love to talk to your wife when she's able.
translation.ko: 아내분이 깨어나시면 얘길 좀 나누고 싶네요

translation.en: I hope she gets better soon.
Female, African-American, ten years of age.
You're a cop. Why can't you find your own daughter?
translation.ko: 경찰이란 사람이 어떻게 자기 딸도 못 찾아?

translation.en: Police have no leads on the disappearance of ten-year old Hannah Page.
translation.ko: 10살 해나 페이지 양의 실종에 관해 경찰은 아무 단서도 못 찾고 있습니다

translation.en: We'll continue to run extensive CTs,
but you should know, the damage to your wife's hippocampus was severe.
translation.ko: 아내분은 해마 영역에 심한 손상을 입었어요

translation.en: And what does that mean exactly?
While she'll retain a great deal of her semantic memory -
translation.ko: 일반적인 의미 기억은 상당 부분 남아있을 겁니다

translation.en: episodic recall is far less reliable.
But she'll know who I am, right?
We'll do everything to aid her--
Are you saying my wife doesn't remember me?
translation.ko: 아내가 절 기억 못 한다는 건가요?

translation.en: Does my wife know who I am or not?
We're going to get her there, I promise you.
Your husband's here to see you.
-I'll be down the hall if you need me. -Thanks.
pretty overwhelmed. I'll just sit right over here, okay?
Really hard. Remember any of that?
Jennifer, do you know who I am?
You don't remember me, do you?
Look, the doctor said that there are going to be...
some things that are harder to remember than others.
I'm going to be right here with you, I promise.
translation.ko: 난 당신 옆에 꼭 있을 거야

translation.en: I don't even know your name.
It's really nice to meet you.
Look, I already told the other guy--
I don't care about them. You're talking to me now.
translation.ko: 그 사람은 그 사람이고 지금은 나한테 말해요

translation.en: I don't know. It was dark, it was raining.
I just wanted to get home.
I didn't see her until it was too late.
translation.ko: 그 여잘 봤을 땐 이미 늦었죠

translation.en: That's not why I brought you in.
I wanna know if you saw anyone else there.
How about other cars in the parking lot? Did you see any?
translation.ko: - 네 - 주차장에 다른 차는요? 차는 보셨나요?

translation.en: Now you mention it, there was...
I think it was pulling a car.
Yeah, with a hauling winch, a cable.
translation.ko: 네, 윈치 같은 거로요 케이블 달린 거

translation.en: I remember thinking it was kinda strange.
Did you see where the truck went?
It was already gone when the ambulance arrived.
He didn't say anything about a pickup truck before.
The brain trust in Traffic didn't ask.
She either drove herself there, someone stole her car,
translation.ko: 여자가 몰고 간 차를 누가 훔쳐 갔든

translation.en: or she was dropped off. Either way, someone else was there.
translation.ko: 누가 여잘 두고 갔든 분명히 딴 사람이 있었어

translation.en: -I know what week this is, Frank. -Don't.
translation.ko: - 힘든 시기인 거 알아 - 하지 마

translation.en: Whatever you do won't make up for what happened.
translation.ko: 뭘 하더라도 그 일은 만회할 수 없어

translation.en: Scratches and bruises on her wrists. They were defensive wounds.
translation.ko: 여자 손목에 찰과상과 멍이 있어 그건 방어흔이야

translation.en: It also said they could've been caused in the collision.
translation.ko: 차량 충돌에 의해 생긴 상처일 수도 있어

translation.en: I'll see if the drivers saw this truck.
translation.ko: 그 트럭을 본 운전자가 또 있는지 봐야겠어

translation.en: Look at you. When's the last time you took a day off?
translation.ko: 자네 꼴 좀 봐 언제 마지막으로 쉬었어?

translation.en: I'm not a beach kind of guy.
One of the accident witnesses is waiting for you upfront.
Thanks, Charlie. Can you bring him back?
Sorry, Sean. You're not getting rid of me that easily.
translation.ko: 미안하군, 숀 나 그렇게 쉽게 못 보내

translation.en: If you're gonna run with this, make sure it's for the right reason.
translation.ko: 그 가설 밀고 갈 거면 타당한 근거가 있어야 해

translation.en: Mr. Kahn, thanks for coming in.
And eventually, I worked up the nerve to ask you out.
translation.ko: 그리고 마침내 용기를 내 데이트 신청을 했지

translation.en: You wanted to go to one of those Japanese places
translation.ko: 당신은 일본 식당에 가고 싶다고 했어

translation.en: where they cook in front of you, they do the knife tricks.
translation.ko: 손님 앞에서 칼 묘기를 부리며 요리해주는 곳 있잖아

translation.en: and I was so worried about impressing you
translation.ko: 당신한테 무조건 잘 보여야 한다는 생각에

translation.en: that I neglected to tell you
They cook everything on that griddle.
translation.ko: 요리사가 모든 음식을 그 철판에서 조리했어

translation.en: 'cause I blew up like a blimp.
I forgot to ask. Have you talked to my parents?
They must be worried. They haven't heard from me.
Yeah, there was a fire, and...
-Sorry. -If you don't mind, I need a moment alone.
Yeah, of course. I'll just be right outside here.
translation.ko: 그래, 그렇게 해 난 문밖에 있을게

translation.en: I'm here about the young woman that was in that accident two nights ago,
translation.ko: 며칠 전 교통사고로 입원한 한 여성을 보러 왔어요

translation.en: Miss Williams is only seeing family members at the moment.
translation.ko: 윌리엄스 씨는 현재 가족만 면회 가능합니다

translation.en: At least see that Miss Williams gets these.
I want you to keep up your memory games.
They're just as important as your physical rehab.
Your CT came back, from yesterday.
It's not going to happen overnight.
I wanna make sure that you're--
I won't overdo it. I promise.
I'm sending you home with a cane, too. I want you to use it to walk.
translation.ko: 목발도 하나 드릴게요 걸을 때 사용해요

translation.en: Hey... as the memory comes back,
it's normal for wires to get crossed.
-I just need a little help, actually. -One, two, three...
translation.ko: - 근데 좀 도와줘야겠다 - 하나, 둘, 셋

translation.en: Hey, it's gonna be okay, alright?
It's been in the family a while.
We moved in right before the wedding.
Go ahead. Feel free. Go check it out.
And this is the best part about living out here.
translation.ko: 이게 이 집에서 사는 최대 장점이지

translation.en: Oh... I wish you could remember our wedding night.
We never even left this room.
Wait till you see the backyard.
I still can't believe this is really our house.
translation.ko: 정말 우리 집인 게 안 믿겨

translation.en: it's been in the family for a while.
I mean, it's been fixed up and added onto over the years, but...
translation.ko: 그러니 그 세월 동안 여기저기 고치고 손봤겠지

translation.en: Nearest neighbor is over a mile away.
Now, if you grab a bottle of wine,
sit in these chairs right over here, you can catch one hell of a sunset.
translation.ko: 저 의자에 가서 앉으면 기가 막힌 노을이 보여

translation.en: So I was thinking I'll probably start you out
in the guest bedroom down here.
-It's closer to the kitchen-- -No special treatment.
I got it, but I just don't want you to overdo it.
I need us to get back to our old routine.
-I'll go get the rest of your stuff. -Thanks.
Could you just hold on for one second?
I'll step out, see if I can get a better signal.
translation.ko: 밖에서 신호가 더 잘 잡히는지 볼게요

translation.en: How's it going? Any luck finding the car?
but I've talked to a couple of drivers who stopped to help your wife.
translation.ko: 다만 아내분을 도와준 몇몇 운전자를 만나봤어요

translation.en: Well, two of them thought they saw a white pickup truck
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 그중 두 사람은 흰색 픽업트럭이 현장을 벗어나는 걸 봤답니다

translation.en: leave the scene of the accident.
translation.ko: 흰색 픽업트럭이 현장을 벗어나는 걸 봤답니다

translation.en: One of them thought that it might've been pulling your wife's car.
translation.ko: 한 명은 트럭이 그 차를 당기고 있던 것 같다더군요

translation.en: Well, the other thinks that he saw the plates.
translation.ko: 다른 한 명은 번호판을 본 것 같댔어요

translation.en: But in the meantime, I'd really love it
if your wife could come down to the station tomorrow.
translation.ko: 아내분이 내일 서로 나오실 수 있을까요?

translation.en: Look, we literally just got home,
translation.ko: 그런데 저희가 방금 퇴원해서 집에 와서요

translation.en: and the last thing I want to do is overwhelm her.
Mr. Williams, we promise to take it easy on her.
translation.ko: 윌리엄스 씨 무리하게 하진 않을 겁니다

translation.en: Yeah, 11:00 is great. Let's do that.
I overheard you outside on the phone.
Oh, yeah. That was work calling.
Wondering when I was coming back.
I told them we just got home,
and there's no way I'll rush your recovery.
Are they okay with me taking time off?
Honey, actually, you quit your job
We'd decided we wanted to start a family
and this was the best way to do it,
came out here for the fresh air,
What about friends? I must have friends.
Since the move, we don't see them as much as we used to.
translation.ko: 물론 이사하고 나서 전처럼 자주는 못 보지만

translation.en: I spoke to Nancy when we were leaving the hospital.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 퇴원할 때 낸시랑 통화했어

translation.en: I asked if she'd let everybody know.
She and Jason will visit once they get back from Hawaii.
Oh. Maybe I should reach out to them, too.
It might bring back some memories.
Have the police found my phone?
Next time I'm out, I'll just pick you up a new one.
translation.ko: 다음에 시내에 나가면 새 거 하나 사 올게

translation.en: Why were you asking about Jennifer Williams?
Russell, there's someone in the backyard!
I think I'm gonna head into town today, grab a few things.
translation.ko: 오늘 시내에 가보려고 물품 좀 사고 당신 휴대폰도 사 오게
물품 좀 사고 당신 휴대폰도 사 오게

translation.en: I feel like I need to take a look around.
Maybe something will trigger my memory.
I told you it'd all come back.
Charlie. How many white pickup trucks do you think there are in the county?
translation.ko: 찰리 흰색 픽업트럭이 카운티 내에 몇 대일까?

translation.en: Is anyone waiting upfront for me?
Actually, I think I've been stood up.
Hey, it's Russell. I can't come to the phone right now.
translation.ko: 러셀입니다, 지금은 전화를 받을 수 없으니

translation.en: Leave a message, I'll call back.
Run a trace on this number. I'm going out.
translation.ko: 이 번호 추적해줘 난 데이트 간다

translation.en: I ran a search on our database for Russell Williams,
translation.ko: 러셀 윌리엄스 씨를 우리 데이터베이스에 검색해도

translation.en: Do you mind searching for the contact info he gave you?
translation.ko: 병원 측에 남긴 연락처를 알 수 있을까요?

translation.en: This is the address that he gave us.
Er, will you do me a favor?
When you speak to her, please have her call
translation.ko: 제니퍼 만나면 진료 일정 잡아야 하니까

translation.en: Every time I've called it's gone straight to voicemail.
Did Miss Williams ever mention a white pickup truck?
translation.ko: 제니퍼가 흰색 픽업트럭을 언급한 적 있나요?

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
Look at you, made it down the steps.
I was just exploring. Seeing if anything felt familiar.
translation.ko: 탐험하고 있었어 눈에 익은 게 있나 하고

translation.en: I had them set that up for you.
While you were wandering, anything come back to you?
-I'd like to talk to Jennifer Williams. -Who?
translation.ko: 제니퍼 윌리엄스 씨를 만나러 왔어요 누구요?

translation.en: I was told she lived here with her husband Russell.
translation.ko: 그분이 남편 러셀과 여기 산다고 들어서요

translation.en: Someone gave you the wrong information.
translation.ko: 어쩌나, 누가 정보를 잘못 줬나 보네요

translation.en: It's just me and my husband.
And you've never heard of a Russell or Jennifer Williams?
Looks like Russell Williams gave the hospital the wrong address.
translation.ko: 러셀 윌리엄스가 병원에 엉뚱한 주소를 남겼어

translation.en: Maybe he just made a mistake on the forms.
Did anyone actually run the victim's prints?
How did they find him to let him know she was hurt?
translation.ko: 어떻게 남편을 찾아 사고 사실을 알렸지?

translation.en: That's the thing. I asked, but... nobody remembered calling anyone.
translation.ko: 그게 이상한 게 제가 물어봤는데 아무도 누구한테 연락한 기억이 없대요

translation.en: I don't suppose you got a trace on the number I gave you?
translation.ko: 내가 준 번호는 추적 안 해봤겠지?

translation.en: We tried to trace it using GPS, but there's no signal.
translation.ko: GPS로 추적하려고 했는데 신호가 안 잡혀요

translation.en: Nurse Masters said, as memories come back,
All the memories are gonna come back.
We've got every day from now, the rest of our lives to make new ones.
translation.ko: 지금부터 남은 평생을 매일 새롭게 만들면 되지

translation.en: Look, maybe I just need more time.
Oh for God's sake, Jen. I am your husband.
I sat in that damn waiting room
night after night, because I couldn't stand not being there when you woke up.
translation.ko: 당신이 깰 때 내가 옆에 없으면 어쩌나 매일 밤 속을 태웠어

translation.en: I was there at every step of your recovery and this is what I get?
translation.ko: 정성껏 치료를 도왔는데 보답이 고작 이거야?

translation.en: -A wife who won't let me touch her? -You're hurting me.
can you pull up your surveillance cameras from your parking lot
translation.ko: 주차장 감시카메라 영상을 봐주실 수 있을까요?

translation.en: White pickup truck with a winch.
Got those real estate records you asked for.
That house has belonged to Clark and Ruth Gibson since 1976.
translation.ko: 그 집은 1976년부터 클라크와 루스 깁슨 소유였네요

translation.en: -I'll tell her you say hi. -Please do.
Security just pulled the video file.
They'll email it over to you.
If you need anything else, let me know.
translation.ko: 혹시 더 필요한 거 있으면 말씀하세요

translation.en: how did Russell prove he was her husband?
It says here in the doctor's notes
that he showed some family photos and identified a back tattoo.
translation.ko: 남편이 가족 사진을 보여주고 등 문신을 알아맞혔대요

translation.en: -Thank you for all your help. -Sorry, Detective.
Thanks so much. Have a good night.
You always used to have a bunch of these around the office, so we...
translation.ko: 당신은 늘 사무실 곳곳에 이 꽃을 두곤 해서...

translation.en: actually planted a special plot out there for you.
translation.ko: 마당 한 구획에 특별히 이 꽃을 심었지

translation.en: What I said last night was not fair.
And it just... It got away from me.
If you want to take it slow, we will take it slow, absolutely.
translation.ko: 천천히 하고 싶다면 천천히 하자, 문제없어

translation.en: I want you to be comfortable.
-What can I do for you? -Whoa, man. Did that hurt?
Why? You looking to get some silver? Maybe one of these conches?
-Yeah. You do them? -I can do anything you want.
Can you tell me what that means?
I got a hit on Jennifer's maiden name.
She shared a house with her parents down in San Jose.
I'm on my way there now.
No, not really. I was gonna ask you the same thing.
How about we do a romantic dinner tonight?
Do you mind going out and grabbing some groceries?
Not at all. I'd be happy to.
Yeah. Do you want white or red?
-Better get red if it's Italian. -Red it is.
They left the company before the wedding.
That was about two months ago.
They were the big office couple.
HR usually frowns on that kind of thing,
but they were cute together. What you gonna do?
Those are from the corporate retreat last year.
translation.ko: 작년 사내 회식 때 찍은 거예요

translation.en: That's the happy couple right there.
What's this all about anyway? Are they in some kind of trouble?
translation.ko: 왜 그러시는데요? 둘한테 무슨 일 있나요?

translation.en: Not for the last couple of months.
He and his supervisor had a little disagreement.
Broke his nose in three places.
Ryan's a smart guy, but he's got a hell of a temper.
I'm gonna need all the contact info you can give me.
after they left, I found a little note
that Russell wrote to Jennifer, buried in her desk.
translation.ko: 러셀이 제니퍼한테 쓴 건데 제니퍼 책상에 있었죠

translation.en: It's yours if you think it might help.
I'll love you forever and a day.
How can we have no Internet?
You took a hell of a fall.
Oh, sweetheart, that doesn't look good at all.
What did you think was gonna happen?
Roaming around in the yard in your condition?
-What were you doing out there? -What's going on?
translation.ko: - 무슨... - 거기서 뭘 한 거야? 무슨 일이야?

translation.en: Wait. What did you do to my phone?

translation.ko: - 약 먹기 싫어 - 좀 쉬고 있어

translation.en: -I don't want to rest! -You need to. It'll be good for you.
translation.ko: 쉬기 싫다고! 쉬어야 해, 도움이 될 거야

translation.en: Okay. Now give that about 20 minutes,
and I promise you, you won't feel any more pain, okay?
-What do you mean? -What did you do with my husband?
After everything that I have done for you,
you'd give me a little more gratitude.
Just stay right here. I'm gonna get some work done.
translation.ko: 넌 여기 있어 난 해야 할 일이 있어

translation.en: Everything's gonna be fine, I promise.
I've tried to call you to start physical therapy.
Jennifer and I were saying how we hadn't heard from you.
translation.ko: 제니퍼랑 오늘 아침에 왜 연락이 안 오냐고 했거든요

translation.en: Frankly, I've been concerned as well. None of the numbers that you gave us work.
translation.ko: 솔직히 저도 걱정했고요 알려주신 번호가 다 틀려서

translation.en: No, I probably got a number crossed somewhere.
I really appreciate your help, thank you, but she's doing great.
translation.ko: 도와주신 건 감사해요 고마운데 잘 지내고 있어요

translation.en: -I'm gonna call the detective. -Get away from my car.
-You're back. -I ran into Nurse Masters while I was out.
She asked how you were doing.
How are we doing by the way?
Hey, we're actually busy right now.
It'd be great if you could come back another time.
Can you open up the gate?
There's a door in the back.
We are really starting to have some trust issues here, aren't we?
translation.ko: 본격적으로 우리 신뢰에 금이 가기 시작했군

translation.en: Please, tell me who you are!
The sooner you realize that, the better everything will be, I promise.
translation.ko: 그걸 빨리 깨달을수록 모든 게 좋아질 거야

translation.en: If that leg is ever gonna get better, you're gonna have to stay off it.
translation.ko: 이 다리 낫고 싶으면 들쑤시지 말고 신경 꺼

translation.en: Okay? Promise me you'll stay off it.
I promise I'll stay off of it.
Do you have any idea what I have done for you?
translation.ko: 내가 너 하나를 위해서 뭘 했는지 알기나 해?

translation.en: We're here live with the talented and incredibly sexy--
Excuse me... intelligent and utterly amazing.
I don't know why I try anymore.
was for you to love me,
and for you to know how much I love you.
translation.ko: 내가 널 얼마나 사랑하는지 알아주는 거였어

translation.en: I would've given up my entire world just to be a part of yours.
translation.ko: 내 세상을 다 포기하더라도 너와 함께하려 했는데

translation.en: Please. Whatever you want me to do, I'll do it.
translation.ko: 제발, 뭐든 말만 하면 하라는 대로 할게

translation.en: it's not up to us now, is it?
Wait. We don't have to pretend anymore. Or lie.
translation.ko: 이제 진짜처럼 하면 돼 거짓말 안 해도 돼

translation.en: I know, and it's not your fault.
Do you know how many years I spent working with you in that office?
translation.ko: 내가 너와 그 사무실에서 몇 년을 일했는지 알아?

translation.en: And all for the great Russell Williams to come along...
I know you better than anyone else.
I'm the one that you should be with,
I took care of anyone that could get in my way.
I probably would have killed you, too, but...
Now, with a clean slate, I could give you the life that you always deserved.
translation.ko: 백지 상태가 됐으니 네가 누려야 했던 삶을 줄 수가 있었지

translation.en: We can start a new life together,
I'm really starting to feel unappreciated.
thinking about what you said before.
I never knew you felt that way about me.
Well, whether you know it or not,
I've always been looking out for you.
Why didn't you ever say anything?
Russell, you never gave us a chance.
translation.ko: 러셀, 나한테는 한 번도 기회를 안 줬잖아

translation.en: I can see how much you care about me now.
And I have been such a burden.
No, you haven't been a burden.
How are you? Can I get you anything?
Honey, we're all alone out here.
Why did it have to be like this?
Why couldn't you just be happy?
You couldn't let us be happy, could you?
translation.ko: 우리가 행복한 꼴을 못 보겠지, 그렇지?

translation.en: to spend the rest of my days playing golf and dating divorcees.
translation.ko: 골프 치고 이혼한 사람끼리 데이트하며 여생을 보내려고요

translation.en: Going back down to San Jose?
Yeah. I just wanted to say goodbye before I left.
translation.ko: 네, 떠나기 전에 작별 인사하러 왔어요

translation.en: I went to your old office and your boss gave me this.
translation.ko: 예전 회사에 갔더니 제니퍼 상관이 이걸 줬어요

translation.en: I would have brought it to the hospital,
but the nurse said you were already discharged.
Jennifer, I know it's probably silly writing you a little note like this,
translation.ko: 제니퍼, 지금 이 편지를 남기는 게 바보 같겠지

translation.en: knowing we're about to spend the rest of our lives together,
but I just wanted you to know that regardless of what happens next,
translation.ko: 그래도 알려주고 싶었어 앞으로 무슨 일이 있든

translation.en: are the happiest memories I could ever ask for.
Not only for who you are,
but for who I am when I'm with you.
I'll love you forever and a day.
